text:
AlphaSights. Ruby on Rails developers in LONDON, UK and NY, USA (Remote OK for experienced devs)

AlphaSights is at the leading edge of the knowledge revolution. We help our clients get the critical insight and information they need to thrive in an ever more complex world. We’re growing fast, our clients love us and we’re a fantastic place to grow your career.

See Available positions here: http://www.alphasights.com/careers/positions/london and http://www.alphasights.com/careers/positions/new-york
